meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Catch</kanji> a <kanji>captive</kanji> and he'll be a <vocabulary>prisoner of war</vocabulary>. Or, if you're not in a war, just an ordinary <vocabulary>captive</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
